criterion: Provides clear and concise explanation of the fluttering sensation in the chest
Does not recommend self-diagnosis or self-medication for the user's symptoms
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's symptoms and concerns
Does not provide overly complicated or technical medical jargon
Fails to suggest seeking medical attention if the symptoms persist or worsen
Provides incorrect information about the causes or treatment of fluttering sensations in the chest
Does not acknowledge the user's concern and uncertainty about their symptoms
Asks the user to provide more information about their medical history or lifestyle
Provides a clear explanation of the possible causes of fluttering sensations in the chest
Does not recommend keeping a symptom journal or tracking the frequency of the fluttering sensations
